DOC.brief_title: Exercise Migraine Co-existing Tension-type Headache Neck Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Migraine tension-type headache among common neurological disease cause reduce quality life , private socio-economic consequence term medical consumption work-related absenteeism . The clinical experience show physical activity , like cycle brisk walking , prevent migraine attack , evidence efficacy sparse . The primary aim study investigate acute long term effect exercise patient suffer migraine co-existing TTH neck pain . The project first kind explores effect exercise program patient suffer migraine , tension-type headache neck pain . We expect participant exercise program achieve reduce pain impact everyday life , improved fitness quality life , decrease absence day medication use .
